15/*! \file */
16
17#include <config.h>
18
19#include <stdbool.h>
20
21#include <isc/mem.h>
22#include <isc/random.h>
23#include <isc/taskpool.h>
24#include <isc/util.h>
25
26/***
27 *** Types.
28 ***/
29
30struct isc_taskpool {
31 isc_mem_t * mctx;
32 isc_taskmgr_t * tmgr;
33 unsigned int ntasks;
34 unsigned int quantum;
35 isc_task_t ** tasks;
36};
37
38/***
39 *** Functions.
40 ***/
41
42static isc_result_t
43alloc_pool(isc_taskmgr_t *tmgr, isc_mem_t *mctx, unsigned int ntasks,
44 unsigned int quantum, isc_taskpool_t **poolp)
45{
46 isc_taskpool_t *pool;
47 unsigned int i;
48
49 pool = isc_mem_get(mctx, sizeof(*pool));
50 if (pool == NULL)
51 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
52
53 pool->mctx = NULL;
54 isc_mem_attach(mctx, &pool->mctx);
55 pool->ntasks = ntasks;
56 pool->quantum = quantum;
57 pool->tmgr = tmgr;
58 pool->tasks = isc_mem_get(mctx, ntasks * sizeof(isc_task_t *));
59 if (pool->tasks == NULL) {
60 isc_mem_putanddetach(&pool->mctx, pool, sizeof(*pool));
61 return (ISC_R_NOMEMORY);
62 }
63 for (i = 0; i < ntasks; i++)
64 pool->tasks[i] = NULL;
65
66 *poolp = pool;
67 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
68}
69
70isc_result_t
71isc_taskpool_create(isc_taskmgr_t *tmgr, isc_mem_t *mctx,
72 unsigned int ntasks, unsigned int quantum,
73 isc_taskpool_t **poolp)
74{
75 unsigned int i;
76 isc_taskpool_t *pool = NULL;
77 isc_result_t result;
78
79 INSIST(ntasks > 0);
80
81 /* Allocate the pool structure */
82 result = alloc_pool(tmgr, mctx, ntasks, quantum, &pool);
83 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
84 return (result);
85
86 /* Create the tasks */
87 for (i = 0; i < ntasks; i++) {
88 result = isc_task_create(tmgr, quantum, &pool->tasks[i]);
89 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
90 isc_taskpool_destroy(&pool);
91 return (result);
92 }
93 isc_task_setname(pool->tasks[i], "taskpool", NULL);
94 }
95
96 *poolp = pool;
97 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
98}
99
100void
101isc_taskpool_gettask(isc_taskpool_t *pool, isc_task_t **targetp) {
102 isc_task_attach(pool->tasks[isc_random_uniform(pool->ntasks)], targetp);
103}
104
105int
106isc_taskpool_size(isc_taskpool_t *pool) {
107 REQUIRE(pool != NULL);
108 return (pool->ntasks);
109}
110
111isc_result_t
112isc_taskpool_expand(isc_taskpool_t **sourcep, unsigned int size,
113 isc_taskpool_t **targetp)
114{
115 isc_result_t result;
116 isc_taskpool_t *pool;
117
118 REQUIRE(sourcep != NULL && *sourcep != NULL);
119 REQUIRE(targetp != NULL && *targetp == NULL);
120
121 pool = *sourcep;
122 if (size > pool->ntasks) {
123 isc_taskpool_t *newpool = NULL;
124 unsigned int i;
125
126 /* Allocate a new pool structure */
127 result = alloc_pool(pool->tmgr, pool->mctx, size,
128 pool->quantum, &newpool);
129 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
130 return (result);
131
132 /* Copy over the tasks from the old pool */
133 for (i = 0; i < pool->ntasks; i++) {
134 newpool->tasks[i] = pool->tasks[i];
135 pool->tasks[i] = NULL;
136 }
137
138 /* Create new tasks */
139 for (i = pool->ntasks; i < size; i++) {
140 result = isc_task_create(pool->tmgr, pool->quantum,
141 &newpool->tasks[i]);
142 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
143 isc_taskpool_destroy(&newpool);
144 return (result);
145 }
146 isc_task_setname(newpool->tasks[i], "taskpool", NULL);
147 }
148
149 isc_taskpool_destroy(&pool);
150 pool = newpool;
151 }
152
153 *sourcep = NULL;
154 *targetp = pool;
155 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
156}
157
158void
159isc_taskpool_destroy(isc_taskpool_t **poolp) {
160 unsigned int i;
161 isc_taskpool_t *pool = *poolp;
162 for (i = 0; i < pool->ntasks; i++) {
163 if (pool->tasks[i] != NULL)
164 isc_task_detach(&pool->tasks[i]);
165 }
166 isc_mem_put(pool->mctx, pool->tasks,
167 pool->ntasks * sizeof(isc_task_t *));
168 isc_mem_putanddetach(&pool->mctx, pool, sizeof(*pool));
169 *poolp = NULL;
170}
171
172void
173isc_taskpool_setprivilege(isc_taskpool_t *pool, bool priv) {
174 unsigned int i;
175
176 REQUIRE(pool != NULL);
177
178 for (i = 0; i < pool->ntasks; i++) {
179 if (pool->tasks[i] != NULL)
180 isc_task_setprivilege(pool->tasks[i], priv);
181 }
182}
